description:
A configurable Windows status bar.

A configurable Windows status bar.
New Features
- Implement HomeWidget with dynamic menu and validation schema 
- Implement workspace button and widget for virtual desktop management 
Bugfixes
- screen scaling logic for 4K monitor compatibility 
Refactors
- rename power utility module and streamline widget hiding logic 
- enhance image gallery initialization and visibility management 
- enhance screen geometry reporting with device pixel ratio 
Chores
- bump build version to 1.3.8 
Fixed
- screen scaling logic for 4K monitor compatibility 
Full Changelog: https://github.com/amnweb/yasb/compare/v1.3.7...v1.3.8
